title: network issue of google pixel XL
content: my pixel XL phone got switched off suddenly when the battery was at 19% then when i switched on there was no signal and network available. then it automatically got switched off a couple of times then when it got properly switched on everything else was working fine except the signal issue where i wont receive calls and after the call i received an alert that i have a missed call from this particular no. so i dont receive any calls and cant make calls since then, will i be able to get assistance? Thank you.
